tickets.title: Update home page hero section to display 'HOLA HOLA'
tickets.description:
Update the hero section of the home page to replace the current heading 'Your Tech Partner as a Service' with 'HOLA HOLA' while maintaining the existing Aurora gradient effect and visual hierarchy.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- The main heading in HeroSection component displays 'HOLA HOLA' instead of 'Your Tech Partner as a Service'
- The Aurora gradient effect (green shades: #10B981, #22c55e, #34D399, #059669) is applied to the new heading text
- All animations (entrance, scale, shine effects) remain intact and functioning
- The supporting paragraph text below the heading remains unchanged
- All other home page sections (Problems, Solutions, CTA, FAQ) remain unchanged
- Page builds successfully with no TypeScript or linting errors
- Visual appearance matches the current design system and responsive behavior
